title: Beau Nelson and Shannon Heth
description:
In this episode Ellen sits down with best friends and co-authors, Beau Nelson and Shannon Heth to discuss their book 'Cinderella, you bitch!' They talk about the importance of managing expectations, our ideas around masculinity, and how to take a compliment.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
